Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Jackson.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Jackson.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Paulina
ShortDescription: 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via: Diversey, Ashland, Belmont, Damen, Diversey, due to, street blockage, near Diversey/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Diversey, Ashland, Belmont, Damen, Diversey, due to, street blockage, near Diversey/Paulina.

Allow extra travel time.
